title: The election campaign hasn’t even begun – but the Tories’ cunning plan is already clear
text:
Do you live in a Leave-voting Labour seat in the north of England? If so, commiserations. You’re about to spend the next six weeks being pursued everywhere you go by Tory activists.

They’ll chase you down the street. They’ll flood your hall with leaflets. And then, after you’ve locked yourself weeping into the cupboard under the stairs to escape the endless hammering at your door, out of the darkness will come a tap on your shoulder, and an unknown voice will whisper, “Excuse me, madam, but may I ask whether you’ll be voting Conservative?”

Sorry. But there’s no escaping it. Tory strategists are absolutely ravenous for your vote in particular. Look at what Matt Hancock, the Health Secretary, said...
description: Do you live in a Leave-voting Labour seat in the north of England?
